headline: Energy Transition Update - Green HVAC Market Surges with Eco-Friendly Building Demand
summary: The global Green HVAC market is undergoing significant transformation as energy efficiency and sustainability become crucial in building technologies. With a valuation of US$ 78.8 billion in 2024, the market is projected to grow at a 7.0% CAGR, reaching US$ 165.1 billion by 2035. This growth is largely fueled by strict environmental regulations and a rising demand for eco-friendly buildings, despite challenges such as reduced subsidies and lower gas prices impacting the market in Europe...
